price: Onu, Allah'tan başka taptığı şeyler (o zamana kadar tevhid dinine girmekten) alıkoymuştu. Çünkü kendisi inkârcı bir kavimdendi.
arabic: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waṣaddahā mā kānat taʿbudu min dūni al-lahi innahā kānat min qawmin kāfirīna
